CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_landing', false, 'tZyOKbtBW1Y6jgOgyl3rm-ghuJUJsbLCHIgBPzIXDfk', 'v3.5.0--HctyFT_D_wlT2tGunvr1n_iuLuiaaKStldMhl6fByD8', 'G1tXSLAKJcqLQoXq-U8oe_uoUpgn_gRg6lNcFdE7Ses'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_landing; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_landing (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure

UPDATE _content_info SET ready = true WHERE id = 'checksum_landing'; -- meta
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_docs', false, '34VO9dvAPvtpqIagDKzbpgcpKTSRhud0mLOnSKb5i1E', 'v3.5.0--Wxz2Jhlwbkm7uiSfVvjllELHjUWmNkhCY1oGEExwSts', 'DajIZdVBzGGRn9-4QDFKy-5nlHrggNZvCUQf7vCPb2g'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_docs; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_docs (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "links" TEXT NULL, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure

But the search help entity will only be generated if any property has an value in the \"search help\" column."],["p",{},["img",{"alt":"customizing tree search helps","src":"pictures/customizing/search_help_tree.png"}]],["p",{},"Every search help entity will have 2 properties:"],["ul",{},["li",{},"value"],["li",{},"description"]],["h2",{"id":"fixed-domain-values"},"Fixed domain values"],["p",{},"The fixed domain values can be created as a value help with following customizing:\n",["img",{"alt":"fixed domain value help","src":"pictures/customizing/fixed_domain_vh.png"}]],["p",{},"So to get it to work you only need to enter the data element into the \"data_element\" column."],["p",{},"The framework automatically propergates the values."],["p",{},"In the example the value help enity will be: ",["strong",{},"fixedDomainValueHelpSet"]],["h2",{"id":"valuehelp-from-table"},"Valuehelp from table"],["p",{},"As a value help a table with the description and value fields can be specified. The entityset contains the metadata of the document."],["h4",{"id":"get_entity"},"get_entity"],["p",{},"This method reads out the entity of the document. The entity contains the metadata of the document."],["h4",{"id":"get_stream"},"get_stream"],["p",{},"This method reads out the stream of the document. The stream contains the binary data of the document."],["h3",{"id":"protected"},"Protected"],["h4",{"id":"get_file"},"get_file"],["p",{},"This method reads out the file data and returns it as structure of type ",["a",{"href":"/dev-objects/ddic/structures/zodata_file"},"ZODATA_FILE"],".\nIt is called within the method ",["a",{"href":"#get_stream"},"get_stream"]," and should be redefined in the inherited class."],["h4",{"id":"get_mime_type_from_type"},"get_mime_type_from_type"],["p",{},"This method reads out the mime type from the type of the document.\nIt could be redefined in the inherited class, if other mime types are needed.\nBy default it converts:"],["ul",{},["li",{},"PDF -> application/pdf"],["li",{},"DOC -> application/msword"],["li",{},"JPG -> image/jpeg"],["li",{},"others -> application/octet-stream"]]],"toc":{"title":"","searchDepth":1,"depth":2,"links":[{"id":"methods","depth":2,"text":"Methods","children":[{"id":"public","depth":3,"text":"Public"},{"id":"protected","depth":3,"text":"Protected"}]}]}}', 'Documents entity class', 'md', NULL, '{}', 'true', '/dev-objects/classes/zcl_odata_documents', '{"title":"ZCL_ODATA_DOCUMENTS","description":"Documents entity class"}', '4.dev-objects/classes/ZCL_ODATA_DOCUMENTS', '_tpKHUv8R4glcdRsxl2G1dlq8uCSKMUjYJsorMZHipQ'); -- _tpKHUv8R4glcdRsxl2G1dlq8uCSKMUjYJsorMZHipQ

INSERT INTO _content_docs VALUES ('docs/4.dev-objects/classes/ZCL_ODATA_MAIN.md', 'ZCL_ODATA_MAIN', '{"type":"minimark","value":[["p",{},"This abstract class is the blueprint for every entity class used by this framework."],["h2",{"id":"iwbepif_mgw_appl_srv_runtime"},["a",{"href":"/dev-objects/sap-objects/iwbep-if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime"},"/IWBEP/IF_MGW_APPL_SRV_RUNTIME"]],["p",{},"Every method of the \"/iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime\" interface can be redefined in the sub class. Only the methods that you really need have to be redefined."],["h2",{"id":"calling-other-methods-of-the-dpc_ext-class"},"Calling other Methods of the DPC_EXT Class"],["p",{},"For calling other methods of the dpc_ext class you can use the protected attribute \"DPC_OBJECT\". It holds the instance of the dpc_ext class."],["h2",{"id":"methods"},"Methods"],["h3",{"id":"before_processing"},"BEFORE_PROCESSING"],["p",{},"This method can be used and redefined. Â Just add this method before calling the entity class.\nHere you can add some logic that should be executed before calling the odata methods."],["h3",{"id":"raise_error"},"RAISE_ERROR"],["p",{},"This method can be used to convert own exception classes into exceptions that can be handled in the UI with the \"message manager\"."],["h3",{"id":"copy_data_to_ref"},"COPY_DATA_TO_REF"],["p",{},"This method uses the standard odata \"copy_data_to_ref\" method. But adds a custom returning header with the maximal count."],["h3",{"id":"get_request_header"},"GET_REQUEST_HEADER"],["p",{},"Reads out the header attributes of the request."],["h3",{"id":"entityset_filter_page_order"},"ENTITYSET_FILTER_PAGE_ORDER"],["p",{},"This method applies dynamic filtering, pagination and sorting to the current entity set table. This is ment to be called after selecting the entries."],["blockquote",{},["p",{},["span",{},"!attention"],"\nThis can be heavily non performant. If you can, please filter and paginate your entries before or while selecting.\nThis is a lazy option without caring about performance."]],["p",{},"The options can also be called separate."],["ul",{},["li",{},["a",{"href":"#PAGINATE_COLLECTION"},"PAGINATE_COLLECTION"]],["li",{},["a",{"href":"#FILTER_COLLECTION"},"FILTER_COLLECTION"]],["li",{},["a",{"href":"#ORDER_COLLECTION"},"ORDER_COLLECTION"]]],["h3",{"id":"paginate_collection"},"PAGINATE_COLLECTION"],["p",{},"This method can be used to add the pagination logic to the collection."],["h3",{"id":"filter_collection"},"FILTER_COLLECTION"],["p",{},"This method dynamically filters the collection."],["h3",{"id":"order_collection"},"ORDER_COLLECTION"],["p",{},"This method dynamically sorts the collection."]],"toc":{"title":"","searchDepth":1,"depth":2,"links":[{"id":"iwbepif_mgw_appl_srv_runtime","depth":2,"text":"/IWBEP/IF_MGW_APPL_SRV_RUNTIME"},{"id":"calling-other-methods-of-the-dpc_ext-class","depth":2,"text":"Calling other Methods of the DPC_EXT Class"},{"id":"methods","depth":2,"text":"Methods","children":[{"id":"before_processing","depth":3,"text":"BEFORE_PROCESSING"},{"id":"raise_error","depth":3,"text":"RAISE_ERROR"},{"id":"copy_data_to_ref","depth":3,"text":"COPY_DATA_TO_REF"},{"id":"get_request_header","depth":3,"text":"GET_REQUEST_HEADER"},{"id":"entityset_filter_page_order","depth":3,"text":"ENTITYSET_FILTER_PAGE_ORDER"},{"id":"paginate_collection","depth":3,"text":"PAGINATE_COLLECTION"},{"id":"filter_collection","depth":3,"text":"FILTER_COLLECTION"},{"id":"order_collection","depth":3,"text":"ORDER_COLLECTION"}]}]}}', 'Class ZCL_ODATA_MAIN', 'md', NULL, '{}', 'true', '/dev-objects/classes/zcl_odata_main', '{"title":"ZCL_ODATA_MAIN","description":"Class ZCL_ODATA_MAIN"}', '4.dev-objects/classes/ZCL_ODATA_MAIN', 'raWBjRVPzgeKShBzWF26On1L4IRDzJzEIzAvGKCjUc0'); -- raWBjRVPzgeKShBzWF26On1L4IRDzJzEIzAvGKCjUc0

framework."],["p",{},"Example:"],["pre",{"className":"language-abap shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"DATA(lo_entity_type_inv) = ).\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":9},["span",{},"ENDMETHOD.\n"]]]],["h3",{"id":"get_entity"},"GET_ENTITY"],["p",{},"The same for the ",["code",{},"GET_ENTITY"]," method."],["h4",{"id":"redefine-1"},"Redefine"],["pre",{"className":"language-abap shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"METHODS /iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entity REDEFINITION.\n","language":"abap","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{},"METHODS /iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entity REDEFINITION.\n"]]]],["h4",{"id":"fill-the-method-1"},"Fill the method"],["pre",{"className":"language-abap shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"METHOD /iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entity.\n    DATA ls_material TYPE mara.\n\n    io_tech_request_context->get_converted_keys( IMPORTING es_key_values = ls_material ).\n\n    SELECT SINGLE * FROM mara INTO ls_material WHERE matnr = ls_material-matnr.\n\n    copy_data_to_ref( EXPORTING i_data = ls_material\n                    CHANGING  c_data = er_entity ).\nENDMETHOD.\n","language":"abap","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{},"METHOD es_key_values = ls_material ).\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":6},["span",{},"    SELECT SINGLE * FROM mara INTO METHODS /iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entityset REDEFINITION.\n    METHODS /iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entity    REDEFINITION.\n\n  PROTECTED SECTION.\n\n  PRIVATE SECTION.\nENDCLASS.\n\n\nCLASS zcl_odata_material IMPLEMENTATION.\n  METHOD /iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entityset.\n    DATA lt_materials TYPE mara_tab.\n\n    SELECT * FROM mara\n      INTO TABLE lt_materials.\n\n    copy_data_to_ref( EXPORTING i_data = lt_materials\n                      CHANGING  c_data = er_entityset ).\n  ENDMETHOD.\n\n  METHOD the methods of the material class.\nYou can find the boilerplate code in the ",["a",{"href":"../DPC-boilerplate-code"},"DPC boilerplate code"]," section of the documentation.\nThis would be the full dpc_ext class:"],["pre",{"className":"language-abap shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"CLASS zcl_blubb_dpc_ext DEFINITION\n  PUBLIC\n  INHERITING FROM zcl_blubb_dpc\n  CREATE PUBLIC.\n\n  PUBLIC SECTION.\n    METHODS /iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entityset REDEFINITION.\n    METHODS /iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entity    REDEFINITION.\n\n    METHODS constructor\n      RAISING /iwbep/cx_mgw_busi_exception.\n\n  PROTECTED SECTION.\n\n  PRIVATE SECTION.\n    DATA mt_data_providers TYPE REF TO zcl_odata_data_provider.\n\nENDCLASS.\n\n\nCLASS zcl_blubb_dpc_ext IMPLEMENTATION.\n  METHOD constructor.\n    super->constructor( ).\n    TRY.\n        mt_data_providers = NEW #( me ).\n\n        NEW zcl_odata_fw_controller( ''Namespace'' )->define_dpc( mt_data_providers ).\n      CATCH zcx_odata INTO DATA(lo_error).\n        NEW zcl_odata_error_handler( me )->raise_exception_object( lo_error ).\n    ENDTRY.\n  ENDMETHOD.\n\n  METHOD /iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entityset.\n    DATA(ls_data_provider) = mt_data_providers->get( iv_entity_name ).\n    ls_data_provider-instance->before_processing( ).\n    ls_data_provider-instance->set_context( mo_context ). \" for SADL features\n\n    ls_data_provider-instance->/iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entityset(\n      EXPORTING iv_entity_name           = iv_entity_name\n                iv_entity_set_name       = iv_entity_set_name\n                iv_source_name           = iv_source_name\n                it_filter_select_options = it_filter_select_options\n                it_order                 = it_order\n                is_paging                = is_paging\n                it_navigation_path       = it_navigation_path\n                it_key_tab               = it_key_tab\n                iv_filter_string         = iv_filter_string\n                iv_search_string         = iv_search_string\n                io_tech_request_context  = io_tech_request_context\n      IMPORTING er_entityset             = er_entityset\n                es_response_context      = es_response_context ).\n  ENDMETHOD.\n\n  METHOD /iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entity.\n    DATA(ls_data_provider) = me->mt_data_providers->get( iv_entity_name ).\n    ls_data_provider-instance->before_processing( ).\n    ls_data_provider-instance->set_context( mo_context ). \" for SADL features\n\n    ls_data_provider-instance->/iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~get_entity(\n      EXPORTING iv_entity_name          = iv_entity_name\n                iv_entity_set_name      = iv_entity_set_name\n                iv_source_name          = iv_source_name\n                it_key_tab              = it_key_tab\n                it_navigation_path      = it_navigation_path\n                io_tech_request_context = io_tech_request_context\n      IMPORTING er_entity               = er_entity\n                es_response_context     = es_response_context ).\n  ENDMETHOD.\nENDCLASS.\n","language":"abap","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{},"CLASS zcl_blubb_dpc_ext the entity customizing.\nStructure = ",["code",{},"MARA"]," and Class = ",["code",{},"ZCL_ODATA_MATERIAL"],".\n",["img",{"alt":"Entiy Customizing","src":"/pictures/examples/material_entity_customizing.png"}]],["h2",{"id":"customize-the-properties"},"Customize the Properties"],["p",{},"After you declared the entity you need to add the properties to the entity. This can be archived in the customizing.\nJust click on the next folder in the customizing view. At least one property should be added to the entity and the key should be defined."],["p",{},["img",{"alt":"Property Customizing","src":"/pictures/examples/material_entity_props_customizing.png"}]],["p",{},"In this example the ",["code",{},"matnr"]," is the key property. The fieldname should be the same as the fieldname in the structure."],["h2",{"id":"test-the-service"},"Test the service"],["p",{},"Now everything is set up and you can test the service in the Gateway Client."],["style",{},"html .light .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-light);background: var(--shiki-light-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-light-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-light-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-light-text-decoration);}html.light .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-light);background: var(--shiki-light-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style:
